csr.uart.tx

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x8
Size:
0x4
Source:
csr.rdl

Description

UART Tx Register

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31] busy r 0x0 csr.uart.tx.busy
[30:8] - - - -
[7:0] data rw 0x0 csr.uart.tx.data[7:0]

Field Descriptions

busy - csr.uart.tx.busy

Indicates that UART cannot accept next data transfer

data - csr.uart.tx.data[7:0]

Data to send
